name: Falafels
preparation: Place contents of pouch in mixing bowl. Add hot water and lemon juice. Stir until combined. Let stand 10 min.
Preheat large fry pan over medium heat. Add olive oil. Using a tablespoon, drop batter into pan. Cook until golden brown (on both sides).
Preheat oven to 375Â° F. Brush a muffin pan with oil. Spoon batter onto prepared pan and bake for 10 min.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve on a whole grain pita with veggies, 1⁄2 cup Dillicious Tzatziki and 1 cup veggies, your choice.
